LanguageData.NY_ability_StarSwordAir.label: celestial slash
LanguageData.NY_ability_StarSwordAir.description: Unleash a compressed slash with the power of stars, damage the target and everything around it.
LanguageData.NY_ability_StarSwordRain.label: celestial rain
LanguageData.NY_ability_StarSwordRain.description: Projecting five slashed at once, exausting the weapon and need time to recover.
